item.title: Show HN: In a single HTML file, an app to encourage my children to invest
item.description:
That way, he gathered a decent amount of capital for his first investment adventure. I explained to my kids that investing is like having a magic box that generates more money over time. 90 The D-iNvestments app, in HTML format D-iNvestments showing daily capital growth.

item.title: FCC Republicans force prisoners and families to pay more for phone calls
item.description:
The 2024 order adopted video call rate caps for the first time, setting rates from $0. 7 percent that she said was added in the “11th hour. The inflation “factor will be adopted without being given notice to the public that it was being considered… or evidence that it’s necessary,” Gomez said.
